import React, { Component } from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom ' import axios from 'axios'; //Golbal Variable From Online const url=`http://localhost:3001/user` class LocalApi1 extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { userData:[] //empty array for accessing the url data } } render() { return (<>

Fetching_LocalApi_Data into React

{ this.state.userData.map( (res,i)=> { return() }) }
User_Id Id Title Completed Action
{res.userid} {res.id} {res.title} {res.completed ? "true" : "false" } VIEW EDIT DELETE
) } componentDidMount() { axios.get(url).then( (result) => this.setState({userData:result.data })); } } export default LocalApi1;
